text: Na wɔfrɛ Salomo adan no mu baako Lebanon Kwaeɛm Ahemfie.7.2 Na wɔfrɛ no Lebanon Kwaeɛ Ahemfie ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔahyehyɛ sida adum no te sɛ kwaeɛm nnua. Na sida no firi Lebanon. Na ne ntentenemu yɛ anammɔn ɔha ne aduonum. Ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ anammɔn aduɔson enum, ɛnna ne ɔsorokɔ yɛ anammɔn aduanan enum. Na ntweneduro nsamsoɔ no mpunan no deda ntweneduro fadum ɛnan a wɔatoto ahyehyɛ no tee so.
